raw_body:
Dr. MERVYN B. WICKRAMASINGHE (Retired Entomologist Anti-Malaria Campaign),​ beloved husband of Chandrani,​ loving father of Lasitha and Damindi,​ father-in-law of Nadeesh Pathiraja,​ grandfather of Dulandi and Thisala,​ expired. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour,​ Borella. Cremation at Kanatte at 2 p.m. on 21st February (Wednesday).
012507
